title: JOYIN 36 Colors Assorted Washable Tempera Paint Sticks, Quick Drying and No Mess Paint Sticks for Arts and Crafts Project, Art Easter Gifts for your Kids and Artists
features: SUPER VALUE PACK. Our Vibrant and Quick Dry Paint Sticks for Kids/Children/Toddlers come with 36 Brilliant Colors(0.42oz/12g). These Non Toxic Colors include 24 classic colors, 6 metallic, and 6 neon colors.
36 COLORED STICKS BODY DESIGN: Our art paint stick is a visible stick color with the same paint inside that makes you choose paint colors easily.

ASTM-D4236 APPROVED JOYIN PRIME TEMPERA PAINT COLORING SYSTEM: Kid-friendly and Non-Toxic. Our washable paint sticks are mess-free with no more wasted paint. These washable paint sticks for crafts can be easily washed out with soap and water. New colors will continue to be added for more variety.

36 PREMIUM PIGMENT TEXTURE PAINT: Our Tempera Paint Sticks include 36 rich colored paint sticks with classic, metallic, and neon colors. These quick-dry paint sticks have a crackless and flakeless texture after painting. This Washable Tempera Paints for Kids dries quickly in seconds and has Long-lasting vibrant colors! Our drying paint is perfect for parent-child Play period and a great essential kit for any arts and crafts paint project.

FUN PAINTING IDEAS INCLUDE: Our tempera paint sticks for kids/children/toddlers are perfect for wood painting, chalkboard, and canvas. This sticks paint can be used for a variety of techniques like elbow and finger painting to explore creativity!
description: Product Description Great for Most Surfaces Suitable for most surfaces, including wood, paper, canvas, glass, fabrics, stone, and that pet rock you've been meaning to paint! A true crafting gift. Child-Safe and Cleans Easily Non-toxic paints wash off easily with warm water and soap. The vibrant colors don't stain or dull after standard drying time, so your projects will look vivid from day one. Non-Cracking Texture This tempera formula features a smooth texture that doesn't crack even after drying! Try it on different surfaces to see the magic at work! 36 Pcs Assorted Washable Tempera Paint Sticks Washable Marker Set 36 packs Pencil Set Washable Kids Paint 12 Colors Buying Options Buying Options Buying Options Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 718 4.2 out of 5 stars 64 4.8 out of 5 stars 118 4.3 out of 5 stars 509 Price £13.49 £ 13 . 49 £15.61 £ 15 . 61 — no data £19.99 £ 19 . 99 Safety approved ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
